segments.text: No , not very much . He's too ambitious and dishonest .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I agree . I like his brother Paul . They are not alike .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . They are completely different . Paul is very sociable and much more honest than his brother .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of person do you consider yourself to be ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I'm polite , careful , relaxed and shy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I don't think you're shy ! You are always chatting with new people when we go to a party .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . Yes , but those people always start talking to me . I never talk to them first.Perhaps I'm not as shy as I think . Anyway , you're certainly not shy !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're right . I love going out and making new friends .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So , you'll be at my birthday party on Friday ?
segments.speaker: S2
